amendment.description: To cap the local cost share under the contract air traffic control tower program at 20 percent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 22 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 22 proposed by Senator Rockefeller for Senator Pryor. (consideration: CR S830-833; text: CR S830) To cap the local cost share under the contract air traffic control tower program at 20 percent.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 22 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 22 proposed by Senator Rockefeller for Senator Pryor.
